Text: Just added a shit ton of trackers hope that boosts seeding. This is the first torrent I've made so just gimmy so Ideas on how to speed this shit up.

You could point out the source -- The Hub, Web Capture, iTunes...
Many of the bronies (sp?) out there hate the Hub captures because it's loaded with badging and commercial stuff...
You should also point out the technical stuff (sound codec, channels, bitrate, video codec, pixel size, etc.).  You did get the package type.

Info on this file from VLC:

Video
Codec: H264 - MPEG-4 AVC (part 10) (avc1)
Resolution: 1920x1080
Frame rate: 23.976023

Audio

Channels: Stereo
Sample rate: 44100 Hz

Don't have anything to confirm the bitrate at the moment and I'm feeling a bit lazy. I can confirm the source is The Hub, and the general quality of this is decent.
